reviewText: I have been searching for The Curious Case of Santa Claus since seeing it on television many years ago. It is a well-told story (unintentional, perhaps) of the Christian origins and cultural secularization of St. Nicholas. Whether one is Christian or not really isn't the point: All humans can meet on the common ground of kindness and generosity regardless of one's choice of Faith. Christmas can be a time for the human goodness we share together, leaving theological differences aside.
